content: i m working hard to bust through the crazy stash of yarn at my house inspired by my other wobbly v_stitch patterns i created a handbag/tote that can be made in just a few hours this bag starts with a wobbly square and continues with wobbly stripes i used scrap yarn left from my sophie s universe blanket and chose my colors at random rather than order the colors you can make this bag in one color or in multiple colors use a button to create a quick closure you can find this free pattern on my blog
